titleStmt.title: Jus regum. Or, a vindication of the regall povver: against all spirituall authority exercised under any form of ecclesiasticall government. In a brief discourse occasioned by the observation of some passages in the Archbishop of Canterburies last speech. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.
Hunton, Philip, 1604?-1682,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, dwelling at the signe of the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Parker by Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by H. Par:"; "May 21".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard.
